revised_title: Terrestrial Ecosystems in the Antarctic: A Comprehensive Overview
tldr: This article discusses the terrestrial ecosystems in the Antarctic, focusing on the composition and distribution of flora and fauna, as well as the impact of environmental factors on these ecosystems. It highlights the research conducted on various Antarctic localities, including Signy Island, South Georgia, and Macquarie Island, and the relationships between terrestrial Antarctic ecosystems and climatic, edaphic, and historical factors.
